scripts.clean: find packages -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find packages -name 'tsconfig.tsbuildinfo' -type f -delete
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:common && npm run build:packages
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/session-recorder-browser && npm run build && cd ../session-recorder-node && npm run build
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
